title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: For auction is a rare ColdCoin Spy Coin #042 of 100The coin opens up on the back so you can store items like a micro SD card inside.You would use the included ring with coin and tap it down on a hard surfaceHere is a link to a video that the maker made showing this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IHPVztTqg2ESTARTING BID: 0.0040BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 4th, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Not familiar with this coin. What year? Was this the only coin in the project? Any info would be great
